## EthersRmm.createEngine() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Executes a deploy engine transaction from the primitive factory using the signer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createEngine(params: EngineCreationParams, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<EngineCreationDetails>;
```
